code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from'./reducers';var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk,composeWithDevTools];var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export default store;
